title: Reconnection issues
body: i was playing ranaked and during loading screen a message popped up saying league has crashed. I reconnected and my team remaked so i lost 14 LP. Is there any way you cna give my Lp back since the servers crashed and it wasn't my fault.

replies.body: It sounds like you experienced a bugsplat, which can happen from bad drivers or something else on your PC.  We can't revert game stats, even if it was a server issue.  What I do recommend is going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure you don't crash again.  Let me know if you have any questions!
